steps.title: Draft
steps.content: Drafts are the documents, created at initial states of generating order that have not been submitted, yet, in the company for processing.

steps.title: Add New Purchase Order as Draft
steps.content:
This Button is used to create a Draft for Purchase Order,in which we Provide
  • Supplier Name
  • Date of creating draft

steps.title: Access Controll Level
steps.content: Customize Aceess Controll on Submitted Orders.Here you can edit the access control permission

steps.title: Submit
steps.content: This action allows you to submit the Draft to senior authority for the approval.After the submission, draft goes to Submitted section.

steps.title: Purchase Order Draft
steps.content:
This section allows you add the item which you want to purchase in which you have to provide
  • Item Name
  • Qntitiy of Item
  • Unit Example: 5 kg Here 5 is a quantity and kg is a unit
  • Narration
  • Custom Field

steps.title: Edit
steps.content: In this section you can Edit supplier name and date of created draft

steps.title: Delete
steps.content: This section allows you to Delete the Draft.
